title: Black screen after champion select...
body:
Just tried to play a game of league and after the champion select my screen turns blank and says "could not connect to the server" and then goes to the reconnect screen, after i try to reconnect the same blank black screen is waiting for me... After that i got a 20 minute ban for a problem that was not my fault...
Any ways to fix this?? Riot do something please

replies.body: The black screen usually indicates a network issue failing to connect to the game server, and the error you received seems to affirm that.  I suggest going through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Even the leave was not intentional, it still causes other players a negative experience.  It's important to get this fixed and prevent further lower priority queues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
